title: I have noticed that the lights are on 24/7 in the new parking decks at CFCC. Since these decks are basically not used at this time, I was curious if CFCC (or the managing entity) had a energy usage program in effect. Seems like a very real waste that is easy to correct. Thanx, Brian
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=14232
